COMMENT_TX: 55 minute rain delay before start of game
$Norm Cash out at 3B before Al Kaline scored
Roy White left with a pulled muscle in his side
ej,howaf102,P,honoj901,Called third strike Frank Howard ejected by HP umpire Jim Honochick
ej,fox-n101,C,odonj901,Balls and strikes Senators Coach Nellie Fox ejected by HP umpire Jake O'Donnell sometime in the seventh
$Jose Tartabull out at 3B before Jim Grant touched HP
$Mike Epstein bobbled the throw at 1B; 1B umpire Bill Kunkel ruled out, then safe; Don Buford tried to score on play
$Joe Keough thought fly to shallow RF was going to be caught
$Tim Cullen made diving stop and crawled to 2B for the force
40 minute rain delay before start of game
Clay Dalrymple dislocated or broke ankle in collision with Mike Epstein
$Prince Charles and Princess Anne attended the game
$President Richard Nixon attended with Julie and David Eisenhower

umpchange,1,umphome,kunkb101 umpchange,1,ump2b,(None) $Tony Oliva's bat slipped out of his hand and struck the head of HP umpire Jim Odom; Odom was carried off the field and received four stitches high on the right side of the back of his head; 2B umpire Bill Kunkel moved to HP
$Twins manager Bill Rigney argued the call at 1B

ej,blylb001,P,runge901,Bench jockeying (Waved towel) $Rick Renick called out for interference when he and catcher Paul Casanova collided; Twins manager Bill Rigney argued with HP Umpire Bill Haller for a long time; when Haller leaned over to clean the plate, Rigney leaned over, yelled at Haller and kicked dirt back onto the plate; Bert Blyleven ejected by 2B umpire Ed Runge for waving a towel from the bench
ej,manuc101,P,hallb901,Balls and strikes (Slammed bat to ground) Charlie Manuel ejected by HP umpire Bill Haller when he slammed his bat down after the first pitch was called a strike
ej,reicr101,P,goetr901,Called third strike Rick Reichardt ejected by HP umpire Russ Goetz
$Rick Reichardt out at 3B before Frank Howard could touch HP
